summary: Show us your beautiful face serana, remove that ugly hood! This mod simply makes the hood invisible, and removes all biped associations, essentially removing it. I have tried editing the outfit etc. but she still wears it, then this idea poped into my head :) She will NEVER be able to wear it again! :D
